cause.description:
Taylor is Attending Mt. Allison University in the Fall, she will not be able to work as she will be dedicating all her time to her studies. (no parties at all!) Mt. Allison being continually ranked the best University in Canada, is not cheap, and so neither should you be!
Show Taylor your love, and help her to buy books and Kraft dinner!
Taylor volunteers with Kids as an Officer for The Cadet Movement.
Taylor is an artist
Taylor is socially responsible
Taylor is good to her Oma and Opa
1. Taylor needs education
2. Taylor needs food
3. Taylor need shelter
cause.mission: Make sure the kid has enough monies to continue her studies, and research and graduate!
cause.name: Taylor's University Education Fund (fictional cause)
